feed.title: Yoo Group
feed.subtitle: Synthetic organic chemistry is a fundamental science that provides society the means to transform simple raw materials into complex molecules with a wide array of functional properties. As society evolves and its needs change, chemist must develop new synthetic methodologies that enables the preparation of complex molecules that meets the demands of tomorrow.
